<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Courtier's Pillow Book](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2176)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Grimoire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=387" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 112 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This elegant journal has a detailed social dossier on the owner's acquaintances. When you make your daily preparations, you can inscribe a secret or embarrassing foible about a specific individual that you know to be true or have on good authority.

<document level="2" id="action-1673" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
